info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 22 at 7:23AM EDT until June 22 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS Binghamton NY
info.description:
FFWBGM
The National Weather Service in Binghamton has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... East Central Chenango County in central New York... Northwestern Delaware County in central New York... Southwestern Otsego County in central New York...
* Until 1030 AM EDT.
* At 723 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2.5 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Oneonta, Norwich, Guilford, Maryland, Otego, Morris, Milford, Gilbertsville, Laurens, West End, Mt Upton, Rockdale, Emmons, Colliersville, Cooperstown Junction, New Lisbon, Preston, South New Berlin, Wells Bridge and Gilbert Lake State Park.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 10:30 AM EDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 10:30 AM EDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Chenango, NY; Delaware, NY; Otsego, NY

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 10:30 AM EDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 10:30 AM EDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Chenango, NY; Delaware, NY; Otsego, NY
